description: A practical and stylish way to protect your digital camera, the Smart Little Pouch is designed to snugly fit most compact cameras. Constructed from our unique StretchShell neoprene, the pouch not only protects your camera in the most minimal form, it looks good doing it. The Pink Gingham pattern is designed to compliment any of the various models of Pink cameras.
title: Acme Made Smart Little Pouch (Pink Gingham)
